sentences.english: We expect there will be lots of people going to buy tickets due to the snowballing jackpot.

sentences.english: For our aspect reading, both cases will be taken as Sextile cases.

sentences.english: Strangely my heart is drawn to the side of this plum tree.

sentences.english: Wealth has little fortune, u might buy some lottery.

sentences.english: There are multitudes whose life is nothing but a continual lottery. (No. 182)
